description:
The exams are over, and Rin invites Nadeshiko out camping again, but she’s fallen ill. Rin heads out to Nagano again, while Chiaki hangs out with Nadeshiko.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Night of Navigator Nadeshiko and Hot Spring Steam
Nadeshiko Navi to Yukemuri no Yoru
Nadeshiko guide et la nuit de vapeur
ليلة الملّاحة ناديشيكو وبخار نبع ساخن
なでしこナビと湯けむりの夜
나데시코 내비게이션과 온천 수증기가 있는 밤
